entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person who locks the door and gives instructions to Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who is trying to escape with Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a person who is trying to escape with Harry and receives instructions from Dumbledore.

entities.name: miss granger
entities.description: Miss Granger is mentioned as the title given to Hermione by Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Dumbledore gives instructions to Harry on how to escape, saying 'three turns should do it'.
Dumbledore gives instructions to Hermione on how to escape, saying 'three turns should do it'.
Harry tries to escape from Dumbledore's locked door.
Hermione tries to escape from Dumbledore's locked door.
